title: Lec 10: Problems arising due to modern agricultural practices #CH24SP #swayamprabha

tasks.task: Attend a lecture on the problems of modern farming and the need for a second green revolution.
subtasks: Sit and listen to the speaker.
Observe the speaker's presentation and note key points.
Recall previous lectures and connection to modern agriculture.
Understand the reasons for the need of modern agriculture as a basis for growth.
Recognize the importance of developing a love for learning.
Analyze the advantages and disadvantages of modern agricultural practices.
Evaluate the overuse of fertilizers and pesticides in contemporary farming.
Consider the resulting environmental and health issues from chemical use.
Assess the impact of monocultures on biodiversity and natural ecosystems.
Recognize the limitations of synthetic fertilizers and their long-term effects on soil health.
Examine the unsustainable water consumption in agricultural practices.
Understand the resistance development in pests due to chemical pesticide overuse.
Consider the pollution of groundwater and its effects on human health.
Compare historical fertilizer consumption trends with current practices.
Reflect on the escalating costs of farming and its impact on food prices.
Explore the potential risks associated with genetically modified crops.
Evaluate the need for a shift towards ancient agricultural technologies.
